item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 "星际链路 "获得许可后开始在津巴布韦运营
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链 "公司（Starlink）在获得当局许可批准四个月后，开始在津巴布韦提供高速互联网服务。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink began offering its high-speed internet service in Zimbabwe, four months after it was granted licensing approval by authorities.】

item.title: 墨西哥年度通胀率在墨西哥银行利率决定前放缓
item.description: 由于食品和能源价格飙升的势头减弱，墨西哥 8 月份的年度通胀率放缓幅度基本符合预期，这为央行本月考虑再次降息提供了更大的空间。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation slowed roughly in line with expectations in August as a spike in food and energy prices faded, giving the central bank more room to consider another interest rate cut this month.】

item.title: 投资者认为政治风险上升，斯里兰卡债务暴跌
item.description: 本周一，斯里兰卡美元债券的抛售加剧，原因是在本月晚些时候的选举之前，政治不确定性上升，投资者减少了对该国的投资。【原文：A selloff in Sri Lanka dollar bonds intensified on Monday as investors reduced their country exposure over rising political uncertainties before elections later this month.】

item.title: 世界上最古老的游击队重启对石油公司的战争
item.description: 哥伦比亚反叛分子对石油工业发动了新一轮的战争，一连串的输油管袭击导致原油流入河流，黑烟滚滚，直冲云霄。【原文：Colombian rebels have reopened their war on the oil industry with a wave of pipeline attacks that sent crude spilling into rivers and clouds of black smoke billowing into the sky.】

item.title: 谷歌的广告帝国受到抨击，美国反垄断审判即将开始
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌周一将重返法庭，面对美国司法部的指控，即谷歌操纵了价值 6770 亿美元的显示广告市场，违反了反垄断法。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google heads back to court Monday to face US Justice Department allegations that it manipulates the $677 billion display advertising market in violation of antitrust laws, just one month after losing a landmark ruling that it illegally dominates online search.】

item.title: 寒流来袭，法国电力需求增加
item.description: 随着欧洲各地气温骤降，法国的电力需求正攀升至数周以来的最高水平。【原文：French power demand is climbing to the highest level in weeks as temperatures plummet across Europe.】

item.title: 德国商业银行警告：特朗普主导美元的想法有可能适得其反
item.description: 根据德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）一位策略师的长期预测，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划在全球贸易中强制推行美元主导地位，这很有可能导致经济混乱，最终削弱美国货币。【原文：Donald Trump’s plan to force dollar dominance in global trade has a high risk of causing economic disruption that could ultimately weaken the US currency, according to a long-range scenario by a Commerzbank AG strategist.】

item.title: 习近平寻求与西班牙在人工智能和高科技发展方面建立更紧密的关系
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平对西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯说，他希望两国加强联系，共同推动人工智能和新能源等高科技产业的发展。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping told Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez he wants the two nations to strengthen ties and jointly promote development in high-tech industries, including artificial intelligence and new energy.】

item.title: B.B. Riley 正在洽谈出售大美集团的多数股权
item.description: B.陷入困境的经纪交易商和投资公司莱利金融公司（Riley Financial Inc.【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc., the embattled broker-dealer and investment firm, said it’s in talks to sell a majority stake in Great American Group and has a commitment for financing of its brands portfolio.】

item.title: 华尔街思考欧佩克+是否会改变石油路线
item.description:
原油价格并没有像人们希望的那样对产量延迟做出反应，预测人员正在考虑这是否会促使联盟改变策略。【原文：

Crude prices haven’t responded to output delays as hoped, with forecasters considering whether that will prompt the alliance to change strategy.

】

item.title: 苹果加入利用人工智能强制升级的行列
item.description: 如果你的 iPhone 是一年多前买的，那么你不太可能获得苹果公司所有最新的人工智能功能。但首先...【原文：If you bought your iPhone more than a year ago, you’re unlikely to get access to all of Apple’s newest artificial intelligence features. But first...】

item.title: 日本 Rapidus 寻求再投资 7 亿美元推动芯片制造
item.description: 日本芯片初创公司 Rapidus Corp. 正寻求通过发行新股，从现有投资者和新投资者那里筹集 1,000 亿日元（约合 6.96 亿美元）的资金，用于芯片开发工作。【原文：Japanese chip startup Rapidus Corp. is seeking to raise ¥100 billion ($696 million) from existing and new investors by issuing new shares to finance its chip development efforts.】

item.title: 因担忧中国需求，Gucci 自主品牌跌至 2017 年新低
item.description: 由于对中国需求的担忧，法国时装设计公司开云集团（Kering SA）股价跌至七年来的最低点，该公司旗下的古驰（Gucci）品牌是近期奢侈品行业大跌中受影响最严重的股票之一。【原文：French fashion designer Kering SA slumped to a seven-year low on worries about demand in China, with the Gucci brand owner among the worst-hit stocks in the recent luxury-sector selloff.】

item.title: 德拉吉报告称欧盟应允许移动运营商合并
item.description: 欧洲央行前行长马里奥-德拉吉（Mario Draghi）撰写了一份期待已久的报告，探讨欧盟如何保持经济竞争力，报告称欧盟应鼓励电信行业进行更多兼并。【原文：The European Union should encourage more mergers in the telecommunications sector, according to a long-awaited report written by former European Central Bank President Mario Draghi on how the bloc can keep its economy competitive.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 本周美国通胀数据备受关注，债券投资者就美联储的下一步行动展开辩论，比特币 ETF 遭受资金外流。以下是市场动向。【原文：All eyes on US inflation data this week, bond investors debate the Federal Reserve’s next steps and Bitcoin ETFs suffer outflows. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 中国的通货紧缩螺旋正进入危险的新阶段
item.description: 自去年以来，通货紧缩一直困扰着中国，现在又出现了螺旋式上升的迹象，有可能使这个世界第二大经济体的前景恶化，并引发了立即采取政策行动的呼声。【原文：Deflation stalking China since last year is now showing signs of spiraling, threatening to worsen the outlook for the world’s second-largest economy and raising calls for immediate policy action.】

item.title: 报告称巴厘岛寻求两年内禁止新建酒店和俱乐部
item.description: 据印尼国家通讯社安塔拉（Antara）报道，巴厘岛省政府提议暂时禁止新建酒店、别墅、迪斯科舞厅和海滩俱乐部，以减缓该岛的土地开发速度和过度拥挤状况。【原文：Bali’s provincial government is proposing a temporary ban on the construction of new hotels, villas, discos and beach clubs to slow down the pace of land development and overcrowding in the island, according to a report by Indonesia’s state news agency Antara.】

item.title: 不景气的贝恩支持的 BRP 押宝静音电动摩托车
item.description: 雪地车制造商 BRP 公司近四十年来从未生产过摩托车，但该公司认为，人们对电动汽车的兴趣日益浓厚，如果消费者愿意出钱，它将有机会生产摩托车。【原文：Snowmobile manufacturer BRP Inc. hasn’t made a motorcycle in nearly four decades, but the company believes growing interest in electric vehicles gives it an opening — if consumers are willing to pay up.】

item.title: Trafigura 在石油市场的新增长引擎上加大招聘力度
item.description: 随着石油市场对石化产品的需求不断增长，贸易公司 Trafigura 集团正在扩大其在石化产品领域的业务。【原文：Trading house Trafigura Group is building out its presence in petrochemicals, as demand grows for what has historically been niche area of the oil market.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称前日元总裁神田将领导亚洲开发银行
item.description: 读卖新闻》周一报道称，日本前货币事务高官神田正人（Masato Kanda）将被任命为亚洲开发银行行长，但未引述消息来源。【原文：Japan’s former top currency official Masato Kanda is set to be tapped to lead the Asia Development Bank, the Yomiuri newspaper reported Monday without citing a source.】

item.title: 交易员质疑美联储降息步伐，国债走低
item.description: 本周伊始，国债下跌，交易员们期待美国通胀数据为美联储是否会在今年大幅降息提供进一步线索。【原文：Treasuries fell at the start of the week with traders looking ahead to US inflation data for further clues on whether the Federal Reserve will deliver a jumbo interest-rate cut this year.】

item.title: 德拉吉称欧盟若无巨额支出和联合债务将面临风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行前行长马里奥-德拉吉呼吁欧盟每年额外投资多达 8000 亿欧元（合 8,840 亿美元），以提高欧盟的竞争力，并承诺定期发行共同债券，与中国和美国竞争。【原文：Former European Central Bank President Mario Draghi called on the EU to invest as much as €800 billion ($884 billion) extra a year to make the bloc more competitive and to commit to the regular issuance of common bonds to compete with China and the US.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称日元套利风险对股市仍有影响
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）认为，如果美联储本月大幅降息，美国股市将面临日元套利交易进一步平仓的风险。【原文：US equities are at risk from a further unwinding of yen-funded carry trades if the Federal Reserve delivers a jumbo interest-rate cut this month, according to Morgan Stanley’s Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 欧洲央行开始降息，欧元区抵押贷款反弹
item.description: 由于利率下降为购房提供了支持，欧洲银行的抵押贷款在 7 月份继续反弹。【原文：Mortgage lending by Europe’s banks continued a rebound in July as falling interest rates support home buying.】

item.title: 欧尔班暗示匈牙利央行行长人选范围缩小
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班表示，他计划合并财政和经济部门，并暗示受改革影响的部长之一将出任央行行长。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban said he plans to combine the finance and economy portfolios and hinted that one of the ministers affected by the overhaul would become central bank governor.】

item.title: 苹果希望通过新设备重振疲软的可穿戴设备部门
item.description: 尽管苹果公司的 iPhone 16 系列将是其周一产品发布会的焦点，但其低迷的可穿戴设备业务也将得到提振。【原文：While Apple Inc.’s iPhone 16 line will be the focus of its product launch event Monday, its slumping wearable-device business is poised to get a boost as well.】

item.title: 台湾对美出口超中国纪录创月度新高
item.description: 台湾对美国的出口超过了任何一个月对中国大陆的出口记录，凸显了东亚供应链的迅速变化。【原文：Taiwan’s exports to the US topped the record for any month’s shipments to China, underscoring rapidly shifting East Asian supply chains.】

item.title: 南非土地银行达成协议结束债务违约
item.description: 南非最大的农民贷款机构在拖欠债务四年后达成协议，恢复偿还债务。【原文：South Africa’s biggest lender to farmers reached an agreement to resume repayments on its debt, four years after it defaulted.】

item.title: 贡渥集团首席执行官表示，贡渥集团正在通过北美交易增加石油储备
item.description: 贡渥集团联合创始人兼首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）表示，贡渥集团正在加强其原油业务，尤其是美国市场的交易量在不断增长。【原文：Gunvor Group is ramping up its crude oil business, with trading volumes growing particularly out of the US, according to its co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Torbjörn Törnqvist.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表凯瑟琳-戴描述全球化新时代
item.description:
这是我们与中国关系的永久性转变吗？【原文：

Is this a permanent shift in our relationship with China?

】
